items.sentence: I can\'t imagine a world without electricity.

Tom wished he hadn\'t told Mary he loved her.
Tom wished he\'d never asked Mary to do that.
Tom says he doesn\'t know when Mary was born.
I haven\'t been back here since the incident.
He couldn\'t bring himself to shoot the deer.
He reached home shortly before five o\'clock.
I didn\'t know Tom had to do that by himself.
Just tell me what you know about the problem.

This is one of the best beaches in Australia.
This is one of the pictures that Tom painted.
When I\'m home alone, the house is too quiet.
